title: Massive FPS drops
body: I've always run league at 120 fps on max graphics no problem, but the last couple patches have made my league experience become almost unplayable. I can barely get 30, and it still crashes from there even at the lowest graphics possible. any other game I play is just fine still at max graphics, but league is just horrendous. I've tried to follow all the suggestions on the FAQ and no change. help!

replies.body: so this keeps on happening for every body but they do nothing and seems to pretend they dont see it.
